subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: For the Mets, the final day of the season did not pass without controversy when Jose Reyes, who is competing for the N.L. batting title, got a hit in his first at-bat and then asked to be removed from the game.
snippet: For the Mets, the final day of the season did not pass without controversy when Jose Reyes, who is competing for the N.L. batting title, got a hit in his first at-bat and then asked to be removed from the game.
